title: Owen on Parenting, Money, and the First National Bank of Dad
description: David Owen, author of The First National Bank of Dad, talks with EconTalk host Russ Roberts about how to educate our children about money and finance. Owen explains how he created his own savings accounts for his kids that gave them an incentive to save and other ways to teach them about postponing gratification, investing, keeping money in perspective and other life lessons. The conversation closes with a discussion of the value of reading to your kids.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (EconTalk: Russ Roberts)
